info.name: WhatsApp Multi-Session API
info.description: Complete API collection for WhatsApp Multi-Session Manager - A comprehensive WhatsApp multi-device REST API with CRM features

item.name: Authentication

request.description: Authenticate user and get JWT token

item.description: Authentication endpoints for login and user registration

request.description: Get list of all WhatsApp sessions
Get QR code for session login

item.name: Messaging

request.description: General send endpoint for backward compatibility

item.description: Messaging endpoints for sending various types of messages

request.description: Check if phone number is registered on WhatsApp
Get contacts with optional filtering and pagination
Get specific bulk messaging job details

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Welcome Auto Reply",
    "trigger": "hello",
    "response": "Hello! Thank you for contacting us.",
    "session_id": "{{sessionId}}",
    "is_active": true
}

{
    "name": "Updated Auto Reply",
    "trigger": "hi",
    "response": "Hi there! How can we help you?",
    "session_id": "{{sessionId}}",
    "is_active": true
}

request.description: Get user settings by ID (admin only)
Get application logs (admin only, requires database logging)
Delete logs older than specified days
